overview.name: Brandeis Swim Modern Design System
overview.scope: CUSTOMER-FACING PAGES ONLY - No admin/backend modifications
overview.description: Modern, engaging design system for Brandeis Swim Lessons website with emphasis on user experience, mobile responsiveness, and seamless integration with existing CMS functionality

primary_focus: Mobile-first responsive design with touch-friendly interfaces
Modern, clean aesthetic with purposeful dynamic elements
Engaging user experience with smooth, performant animations
Clear information hierarchy and intuitive navigation
Strategic call-to-action placement for conversion optimization
Seamless integration with existing EditableContent CMS system
avoid: Static, boring layouts that don't engage users
Poor mobile experience or non-responsive elements
Hard-to-read fonts or poor contrast ratios

custom_classes_for_globals_css.glass_effect: .glass-effect { backdrop-filter: blur(16px); background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); }
custom_classes_for_globals_css.gradient_text: .gradient-text { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0ea5e9, #003d7a); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-clip: text; color: transparent; }
custom_classes_for_globals_css.card_hover: .card-hover { transition: all 0.3s ease; } .card-hover:hover { transform: translateY(-8px); box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); }
custom_classes_for_globals_css.scroll_reveal: .scroll-reveal { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(30px); transition: all 0.6s ease-out; } .scroll-reveal.revealed { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
custom_classes_for_globals_css.floating_animation: @keyframes float { 0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0px); } 50% { transform: translateY(-10px); } } .float { animation: float 3s ease-in-out infinite; }

implementation_requirements: ALWAYS use mobile-first responsive design approach
ALWAYS include scroll animations for user engagement
ALWAYS use the established color palette and typography system
ALWAYS include proper hover states and smooth transitions
ALWAYS ensure 44px minimum touch targets on mobile
ALWAYS include multiple clear CTAs per page
ALWAYS test accessibility with screen readers in mind
ALWAYS preserve existing EditableContent CMS functionality
NEVER use animations that could cause motion sickness
NEVER break existing component props or functionality
page_structure_template: Start with engaging hero section with clear value proposition
Add navigation breadcrumbs for internal pages
Use progressive disclosure for complex information
Maintain consistent header/footer across all pages
mobile_first_approach: Test all layouts on actual mobile devices
Stack content vertically with proper spacing
Optimize images for different screen densities
Use system fonts for fast loading on mobile
component_development: Create reusable components following design system
Use TypeScript for better development experience
Include prop validation and default values
Ensure components work with existing CMS system

responsive_testing: Test on actual mobile devices (iOS Safari, Android Chrome)
Verify desktop layouts (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)

regular_updates: Review and update color palette annually
Test new browser features and compatibility
